jd: From: Rajeev, Mobcoder rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Reply to: rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Hi, Hope you are doing well!! We do have Urgent opening for the below position. Please do find the job description below for your reference. Would appreciate if you can share your updated resume along with the expected rate. Job Title: PM (Cash Management & Global Banking) Location : Jersey City, NJ (4 days -Hybrid)Durations: 12 Months Responsibility:- Provide the efforts for Project Management to support USD Acceleration Plan. Provide project plans, status report, track issues and risks, budget/actuals tracking, testing co-ordination, implementation plan preparation and oversight.Experienced project manager to coordinate GB IT activities related to USD Acceleration Program. PM will manage SDLC and support program governance Client’s GB IT Management will provide strategy & coaching to allow smooth integration of PM into organization. Skills10+ experience as Project Manager and Business Analyst Experience in Cash Management & Global BankingGeneral banking knowledge, general IT knowledge Consulting experience Role Expectation/expected deliverablesCreate Project Plans for prioritized projectsCreate & Deliver regular status reports to managementTrack project Risks & IssuesManage project budget versus actual spendCoordinate Test planning & executionPlan Implementation Tasks Thanks & Regards Rajeev GuptaSenior IT Recruiter Mobcoder IT Solutions LLCCell: +1 469-676-1623rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Houston, TX 77064- USA
